Education Counselor's Toolbox

The Education Counselor's Tool Box is a list of links to a variety of helpful information, including:

  • Academic accreditation
  • College financial aid (scholarships, grants and loans)
  • How to search for the right college
  • Virtual libraries and free online books
  • Education organizations
  • Specific academic/college information for military members
  • Information on hard copy books and booklets of the various education topics

View the entire Education Counselor's Toolbox, or view individually:

    Have questions about distance learning? See if we've already answered it here.
